attributes.additional_details:
Yesterday in Cambridge Family Court a ruling was made and Judge immediately referenced a complaint made by Applicant against one of the other judges sitting at Cambridge. The message was clear - make a complaint against a judge (which is everyone's right, is supposedly private and confidential) and you will regret it.
How deep does this corruption go? Is it possible to get a fair hearing at Cambridge County and Family Court? How many decisions are based on revenge? How can a fair hearing be possible?
Sack them all without pay. Investigate them and prosecute at least the 2 involved. There is no way of guaranteeing an impartial ruling. No confidence in Cambridge Court! Bias is rife!
